Data Integration / Analytic Discovery / Intelligent Systems

We build data systems that turn complex information into actionable insight.

The Danais Lab (Data Nexus for Analytics & Intelligent Systems) advances foundational and applied research at the intersection of data integration, analytic discovery, and intelligent systems engineering. We develop next-generation database architectures, scalable data infrastructure, and analytic frameworks that automate the transformation of complex information into actionable insight.

Explore Projects Join the Lab
12+ Active projects
6 Collaborating labs
2010 Founded
PhD / Postdoc Open positions

About the Lab

The Danais Lab focuses on data integration, analytic discovery, and intelligent systems engineering. We build next-generation database architectures and scalable data infrastructure that transform heterogeneous data into insight.

Vision

Unlock value from heterogeneous data sources across domains.

Approach

Design database architectures and analytic frameworks that connect integration to automated discovery.

Values

Grounded in robust systems design and data science with a focus on practical impact.

News

Add lab updates, awards, and media highlights here.

Projects

Selected projects from our research program.

Learned indexes with Machine Learning

ML models approximate data distributions to replace traditional indexes with faster retrieval and lower memory.

Database performance tuning with Multi-armed Bandits

Automated physical design tuning for ad hoc workloads, with statistical guarantees on design quality.

Data-driven traffic flow optimization with Reinforcement Learning

Algorithms for ride-sharing dispatch and road network configuration that reduce congestion and wait time.

Improving data quality through domain-driven imputation

Use spatial and domain properties to impute missing values and improve real-world data reliability.

Cheap data analysis with Skipper

Cold-storage query processing with cache management and I/O scheduling to cut analytics cost.

Predictable query performance with Smooth Scan

Runtime morphing between access paths to avoid bad plans and stabilize performance.

Fast data exploration with NoDB

Query raw files without loading; build indexes and caches incrementally from query feedback.
